nodes.text: As a result of the Azzameen family's actions against the Galactic Empire and the Imperial-aligned trading company Viraxo Industries, a competitor to the Azzameens' Twin Suns Transport Services trading company, the Galactic Empire issued warrants for the arrest of the members of the Azzameen family as well as the seizure of all Azzameen property. This Imperialization of Azzameen assets took place shortly after the Battle of Hospital, in which the Azzameens had taken place alongside the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Imperial action saw the family's home base, Azzameen Station, and their company's repair facility captured after a brief skirmish with Azzameen forces.
